locations.title: Love's Travel Stop
locations.content: Love's Travel Stop may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: Once again, Love‚Äôs delivers. Clean facility, affordable gas, fresh food, spotless showers‚Äîand above all, genuine kindness from the staff. I stopped in for a shower and left feeling not only clean, but truly taken care of. Thank you to the ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ coming in and out. I needed a shower so I had to endure the wait but it wasn't too bad I got a delicious Subway sandwich, this place has buffalo chicken for the subs and you don't see that everywhere. The location also could use ‚Ä¶
Amazing shower, very clean facilities super friendly from the staff to the truck driver, has an awesome dog park as well great place
Well this loves is being the ugliest one, I ever stop for a shower, stains all over the shower, sink, & floors. Shower was broken, and is pretty crowded, w/small parking lot 4 trucks.

‚Ä¶ The only reason I knocked off a star is that the showers (which there are only 3) could be updated and properly cleaned. Within 5 to 10 minutes of me leaving the shower another driver was told that it was ready. There was no way everything ‚Ä¶

I‚Äôm a trucker and frequently stop at Love‚Äôs when I need a shower and a place to crash for the night. Out of all the locations I‚Äôve been to I have to say this one is quite possibly the worst I‚Äôve been to! ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ better standards. But I guess it's just a name, and they can't co trol who gets hired or does their part. Wasn't even clean or comfortable enough to shower. Person came over to help at subway and was rude as checking out. He didn't make ‚Ä¶

The place is decent showers were clean when I‚Äôve gone there. The best time to go is 8pm-12am if you don‚Äôt want to wait behind anyone to shower. The store is kinda small for the traffic it gets, but the cashiers are fast and acknowledge you ‚Ä¶

The people are kind who work here but the showers are small and I swear I don't think they clean the showers after someone takes one because my shower has toenail clippings, hair on the wall and sink and it was just nasty! I mean its ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ he was the manager. The other 3 employees standing behind the counter, having some sort of party from the sounds of it. 45 minutes to get a shower, nobody actively using any of the 3, just not cleaning them. Manager guy finally looked over ‚Ä¶

showerReviews.reviewText: Do they offer showers? Yes, at the fuel desk üòä Do they take pilot points? Yes, at the fuel desk üòä Can I ask you and not actually request a shower since no one is at the fuel desk for me to ask? You can, at the fuel desk üòä Are you smug or is ‚Ä¶

Parking lot is 1/2 dirt, very  nice showers, staff is nice, need milk dispenser for coffee replace floor papper for a floor towel in shower

- Like the reviews and follow me for more.
-Have a good day.
God bless and protect everyone.

‚Ä¶ restaurant next door and a dairy queen and Quiznos inside the pilot. Customers service was very nice and caring and don't have anything at all negative to say about my experience here. I didn't use the shower so i have no clue about those.

‚Ä¶ I met was awesome I even talked with the store manager and she is as cool as everyone else.lots of parking,clean shower,at this moment only 4 working diesel pumps  the rest are under construction.so don't park at the working ‚õΩ. I'll be ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ the whole entire building. Update the system. And have it look, modern just like , all the other pilots that I've been to i love going to this pilot. The people are nice. I love the quiznos there ,in the showers are old, but there nice. ‚Ä¶

Rude service. Can't reserve a shower from app or kiosk. Had to wait on the 1 clerk who was taking over 15 minutes with a customer and wouldn't ring me up on a separate register. She eventually got the manager for the other customer and ‚Ä¶

For truckers:-

Very good customer service. Big parking lot. Showers are great, but you have to go inside at fuel desk to book a shower cant use Flying J app to book a shower.
I was skeptical after reading the reviews. The staff was very friendly. They do honor pilot shower credits. The showers have been remodeled and the parking lot is paved with plenty of parking.

showerReviews.reviewText: At least it was a place to park. Not a lot of space there though.  Tried to get a shower at 06:00 but nobody had cleaned the showers so I was refused.  $10/ night for parking.  Not a bad price.

1 star only because the water was hot.  Anyone who says this place is worth stopping at for a shower is full of you know what.  Disgusting, and I felt like I needed another shower after I was getting dressed bc it was so hot in there.  I ‚Ä¶
‚Ä¶ Plus the store is filthy and the bathroom is disgusting. Don't plan on taking a shower here unless you want to invite  a fungus to ride along with you.
Always my stopping point outside of the base. $12 shower and a subway. They also have cooks on during the day.
Paid overnight parking only. Restrooms were gross. Only one person per shower, so if you're a couple go somewhere else.
Needed a shower this place was cheap and clean. A little out the way from where I live but I would go again if needed to shower

showerReviews.reviewText: very clean truck stop, nice people, clean shower rooms. the best petro travel stop i ever seen in the country.

I appreciate visiting this location; however, the shower facilities could be improved. It is essential to note the presence of cockroaches, which can be a concern. Additionally, the cleanliness of the shower heads and the water quality ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ It has touch screen gas pumps, shower facilities, the bathrooms are clean, several fast food restaurants, friendly staff at the coffee shop and plenty of shopping. Great spot to get out, stretch and walk around for a minute.
One of my favorite places to stop. Went into the restaurant and ordered a steak that was so delicious that I wanted to order one to go.  Shower are clean and have plenty of room.

Great Petro!! Showers are phenomenal, very clean and newly remodeled looks like and the shower workers were very helpful with extra towels.. Iron Skillet restaurant is really good. Had a great waitress. Good trucker lounge. Will definitely ‚Ä¶

Overall this is a nice truck stop, spacious shower, hot water and very clean. Food court with Taco Bell, Pizza Hut, and Wendy's. however the the customer service not to sure about. The elderly lady with the glasses at the front desk was ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ and treats to choose from. They have anything you could probably need for a family road trip or all your truck driving needs, such as a hair cut and a shower or maybe even a new bed and purple pillow! While there get your picture with ‚Ä¶
Clean place to stop. I was able to get a haircut and a shower in the same place
Shower's  are always clean! People are always friendly!  Supermart for truckers! There is a little wait for showers during remodel, but it's worth it.
We always try to make it here on our way to Florida. Beware of the shower head in #1, it needs replaced. Only sprays on blast mode.

showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ same thing has happened my other 4 trucks fuel weekly  at pilot flying j. All I needed was a shower last fuel date was Friday 18 july2025 at 330pm. After dealing with customer service yet again i emailed my drivers  that pilot flying j ‚Ä¶
‚Ä¶ Night Crew Shower Guy was smoking outside and we were waiting for showers to be cleaned and read for over 30 minutes. ‚Ä¶

Dirty towels left in the shower and when I said something he said whatttttt then took them out did not re clean the shower or nothing, he then started to clean other showers so unfortunately I did not get a shower today first and last time ‚Ä¶
06/04/2025  Today, there was a free shower.. Basically clean..

2 days no one can cleen the showers .The female manager with her 3 inch long nails is playing on facebook .I hope corporate takes thing straigt .I asked her since she is dooing nothing why there is no cleen shower .And she was so Rude you ‚Ä¶
A little bit dirty around the coffee machines, at least the shower was good.
The shower cubicles take a very long time to clean. The wifi doesn't work.

I just got to my truck after my shower and I was impressed with the maintenance man "B" that went above and beyond. He offered me an extra towel and washcloth. He was very respectful with "yes sir" and "no sir"  Other employees should take ‚Ä¶

no showers! i ordered tru pilot app shower and was waiting for almost 1 hr and nothing. went to front desk and spoke with manager and she said that showers are not ready because they are waiting for employees to clean! showers should be ‚Ä¶

Absolutely terrible customer service. We sat in the waiting area for 2 hours and not 1 shower was cleaned.  There was about 15 other drivers waiting as well.  They told us they only had 1 extra person and he was picking up trash instead of ‚Ä¶

showerReviews.reviewText: Went in here for a shower around 1400 EST. I always scan my rewards card at the front desk and get my shower receipt on paper because Pilot and Flying J app sometimes glitches when it comes to showers which is a headache to try to fix. But ‚Ä¶

It's the worst station in history. I reserve shower and there were 7 people waiting in front of me. I went back an hour and a half and there were still 7 people. No one came out and the employees did not move to handle the situation. We are ‚Ä¶

This rating is for the showers only. They are absolutely disgusting! They obviously don‚Äôt clean the showers. There‚Äôs buildup and mold on curtains and in showers. Piss stains under the toilet seat and the toilet obviously hasn‚Äôt been cleaned ‚Ä¶

Shower number #2 was mine tonight.

It is what it is. It's outdated yes, but the guy cleaning did a great job.

Lucky thing my company paid for my shower.

In and out.

A safe place to park your truck.

Worst Pilot I've been to, I'm a professional driver so that should tell you something. Waited two hours for a shower then the app glitched and started me over. The guy who was supposed to be cleaning showers was always outside smoking. The ‚Ä¶

The service is pathetic, I've been waiting here for 40 minutes, two shower stalls are empty and they haven't been able to clean them for 40 minutes, there are three cashiers at the cash register, you don't do anything, but I've been waiting ‚Ä¶
This pilot was very clean bathroom and shower and parking very convenient

This has to be the worse pilot I have been to. So to my understanding the showers are supposed to be ready and available unless there is plumbing issues. Not the case at this location. They had employees there up to 10pm and no clean shower ‚Ä¶

Worst pilot ive been too the showers are white disgusting and outdated. They give you a pole with a shower number. Very tight trying to get to the fuel stations. It smells like human waste everywhere it made my stomach hurt. I went to the ‚Ä¶

showerReviews.reviewText: At first you see a amazing place to shop and it is don‚Äôt get me wrong and it has nice big parking lot. But when we are buying a shower every thing changes it is a dump. It looks like a mid 70 and nobody cares. I am surprised by some of the ‚Ä¶
The greeting was great but the shower was disgusting. Old Nails on the floor. No counter. Tape to hold the shower curtain.

I came here to simply take a shower; but was introduced by racial sweet-tarts. I can't and will never understand how a place with African- American employees could posses racist counter parts. It's scary that,  I of color, can walk into an ‚Ä¶

We love this place!!! Lots of parking, we can always count on a clean shower, and the friendly staff. Also plenty of food choices, from 4 different fast food restaurants, to the Iron Skillet full service restaurant. It's a regular stop for ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ Problem was told they couldn‚Äôt get me in until 10 am the next Morning 9/4/21 okay find it‚Äôs been a long day so I grab a Hot Shower ( The Best ) and had dinner. Did a little Shopping  Great Customer Service (Chef Chris Edmandson) Cook the ‚Ä¶

Very friendly atmosphere. Several food choices include fast food or  full blown meal. Very clean.   Geared around the trucking industry  but great for all travelers. Shower and rest room facilities are clean

One of my favorite truck stops. Took a shower üöø then looked around the store. I ended up buying two half inch chains and some rugs for my truck.  Next time I get there I'll probably buy two more chains and some binders. ‚Ä¶

I have always liked the big Petro Travel stores. As a truck driver the big shower they have is awesome for a husband and wife. The young black man with blonde tips always has those showers spotless. That young man needs a raise!  The store ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ Chrome and accessory shop it's a little pricey but it is convenient. Plenty of parking. Clean shower. The restaurant though is one of the worst I've seen in a Petro. Store manager is aware of the bad restaurant and said that they are ‚Ä¶
Cool truck stop. Pretty clean. Lots of parking. You will wait for a shower most times. Always busy, but the fuel island is usually wide open.

showerReviews.reviewText: Came late at night and plenty of parking in the truck lot. Shower was clean, food from IHOP was ready in 15mins tasted great and workers in there was super nice. What more can a trucker ask for üôèüèæ‚ù§Ô∏è ‚Ä¶

They said they're not allowed to let truckers take showers right now because there's a boil water notice caused by a storm. I'm not trying to drink the shower water. A shower wouldn't hurt me any more than a swim in a lake would hurt me. Ju ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ amazing. My hubby got chops and I got grilled chicken. He got sweet potatoes and collards, I got collards and Mac-n-chrese. And the lady behind the window where you pay for fuel was just as sweet as can be. Shower was roomy, good, and hot.

Disgusting shower wasn‚Äôt even clean, still had someone‚Äôs razor in the shower and hair
Never again Petro and TA they gotta do better truckers deserve a clean and disinfectant shower
Shower room is not bad. Pls see this hair dryer. I think they found it outside or anyone donate here.

Not bad Overall - shower nice - food in diner dry I ordered Beef tips, garlic butter brocoli, & red mashed potato‚Äôs (no butter or garlic in them) (or gravy I requested) 28$ should at least get what‚Äôs promised on menu. Waitress disappeared ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ Second, the shower took a long time to warm up. Once I got in, it slowly continued to get hotter and I had to adjust it a couple times. Even after the adjustments, the water temperature would randomly spike to about 130¬∞ for a second or two ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ Travel Ctr . Can say was pleased with ample parking clean property friendly staff . Shower / maint. attendants  Will & Julie  if I'm not mistaken  they were very attentive provided a nice clean shower very appreciated.  C- Store well ‚Ä¶
Clean shower awesome laundry Morning and afternoon shift awesome but night shift lazy. He would not fill cheese for nachos and and all the grill food had to warm in microwave. Do better buddy.

Stopped here to eat and shower not bad. People are great here. Showers are just like all the rest are ok. Wanted to update here this has gotten really bad to come here. I reserved parking because I was coming in late well got here no ‚Ä¶
